meanings.definition: The gradual development of something, especially from a simple to a more complex form.
meanings.sent1: The evolutions in technology have made our lives easier.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the evolutions of species to understand their history.
meanings.sent3: The evolutions in fashion trends can sometimes be quite surprising.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic evolutions over the years have been truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The evolutions of the caterpillar into a butterfly are truly fascinating.

meanings.definition: A series of changes or developments in a particular area or field.
meanings.sent1: The evolutions in the music industry have led to new genres emerging.
meanings.sent2: The evolutions in medicine have greatly improved patient care.
meanings.sent3: The evolutions in social media platforms keep us entertained.
meanings.sent4: The evolutions in technology have transformed the way we live.
meanings.sent5: The evolutions in education have opened up new opportunities for students.

meanings.definition: The process of evolving or developing over time.
meanings.sent1: Personal growth involves constant evolutions in our thoughts and beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The evolutions in her career path have been inspiring to others.
meanings.sent3: The evolutions in his cooking skills have made him a master chef.
meanings.sent4: The evolutions in her mindset have brought her peace and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The evolutions in technology continue to shape our future.
